nodes.label: Illustrate plants with and without water.
Healthy plant with water and sunlight, bright green leaves, upright stems
Unhealthy plant, no water and no sunlight, wilted brown leaves, drooping stems
Understands that plants are healthy and growing with water and sunlight.
Understands that lack of water and sunlight makes plants unhealthy and not growing.
Did not label the light source.
Add label for sunlight source to improve understanding of plant needs.
